title: Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing Interprofessional Collaboration Competencies in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 Years of Professional Experience in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields, Basic Collaboration Experience
context.additional_context: A mixed-methods approach where learners from diverse professional backgrounds practice through real-case-based collaborative scenarios, with pre- and post-assessments measuring learning effectiveness.

learning_goals: Learners can apply interprofessional communication strategies with over 80% accuracy
Learners perform at least three successful role adjustments in team-based clinical simulations
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in interdisciplinary collaboration awareness in post-assessment compared to pre-assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
